bibl.title: A Statue of Isis.
Alexandrian Studies in memoriam Daoud Abdu Daoud
bibl.author: SA'ID, Doreya

bibl.note: Headless basalt statue (H. 135 cm) found in 1989 in the water of Abukir Gulf in Alexandria and housed in the Graeco-Roman Museum. Isis (or her priestess or a Ptolemaic queen), late hellenistic period.
bibl.seg: SA'ID Doreya, A Statue of Isis.
Alexandrian Studies in memoriam Daoud Abdu Daoud = BSAA 45 (1993) pp. 291-294, pll. LVI-LVII.
